branchCategory.name: C(D)J2ZW-Z, Air Cylinder, Built-in Speed Controller, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CJ2-Z double acting, single rod with built in speed controller is available in 10 and 16mm bore sizes with stroke lengths from 15mm to 200mm. Available in 3 mounting types for versatility. Optional features include magnet for auto-switch capability.</p>
